resources.string:
Amarok %s

 [Developer] @Deltazefiro

 [Info] Amarok: A simple android app for private file and app hiding.

 [Repo] https://github.com/deltazefiro/Amarok-Hider

 Copyright 2022 DeltaZero, Licensed under Apache-2.0
Setting is only available after unhide
Amarok needs external storage access to hide your files.
Storage permission denied. File hiding is unavailable
AppHider not available. Check MoreSettings -> Switch AppHider.
Hunting alone in the starless night.
Allow Amarok to send logs for analytics.
Changes will be applied on next restart.
DSM: Invalid DSM Provider. Have you installed and activated the DSM Provider on your device?
Hide App failed: Admin not active.

Hints for folder selector: 
	 1. Click 'Use This Folder' to select the Folder
	 2. Always select the file from the local storage 
	(You can slide from the right of the screen to open local files)
Are you sure to remove path \'%s\' from hiding?
Please ensure it is local path and not a virtual one.
Please select AppHider Workmode in More settings.
Check for updates on Amarok start.
Amarok %s (%d) is available to download and install.
Caution: The path you set manually will **skip** the validation. Please ensure the path is valid.
Unsupported Shizuku version: Pre-v11. Please update your Shizuku.
Shizuku: Service not available. Have you installed Shizuku/Shu on your device?
Failed to hide app: Unable to get IPackageManager api.
HideApp with Root.\nRecommended if your device is rooted but without Xposed framework. Root permission is required.

HideApp with Shizuku (or Sui). \nRecommended if your device runs Android 11+ or with Xposed framework. You need to install and active Shizuku or Sui to use this mode.\n* DeepHide: Hidden applications will not show in the system menu in this mode.

HideApp with Delegated-Scopes-Manager.\nNOT recommended unless your device runs Android 10 or below and is not rooted. It may be BUGGY and work unexpectedly. You need to install Icebox or StopAPP and set them as DeviceManager to use this mode.
Make the filename human-unreadable. The basic feature of FileHider. Can not be disabled.
Obfuscate the file signature in the file header to make the file \"corrupted\". This prevents the file from being opened by selecting \"Open With\" manually but may slow down the file-hiding process.
Experimental feature. Obfuscating file headers only have no effect on text files. Enabling this function will fully obfuscate text files. It will slow down the hiding process to some extent.
Not recommended. An enhanced version of \"Fully Obfuscating Text Files\". Utilize this option only if the standard method proves ineffective. It will slow down the hiding process dramatically.
